T = int(raw_input())#100#

while T>0:
	T-=1
	N = int(raw_input())#100 #
	arrivals = map(int, raw_input().split())#map(lambda x:random.randint(1,1000),range(100)) #
	departures = map(int, raw_input().split())#map(lambda x:random.randint(1,1000),range(100)) #
	
	departures_e = map(lambda x: (0, x), departures)
	arrivals_e = map(lambda x: (1, x), arrivals)
	events = sorted(departures_e + arrivals_e, lambda a,b: cmp(a[1],b[1]) or cmp(a[0],b[0]))
	count = 0
	max = 0
	for e in events:
		if e[0]==1:	#arrival
			count+=1
		else:		#departure
			count-=1
		if count>max:
			max=count
	print(max)
